title: Odile Renaud Basso | European Stability Mechanism
snippet: Odile Renaud Basso became the Director General of the French Treasury in 2016.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso - Wikipedia
snippet: Odile Renaud-Basso (born 2 June 1965) is a French civil servant who has been serving as president of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development since 2020. From 2016 to 2020, she served as head of the Direction générale du Trésor.

title: Odile Renaud-Basso - European Commission
snippet: Prior to joining the Bank, as Director General at the French Treasury, Ms Renaud-Basso oversaw the development of France’s economic policy, leading on European and international financial affairs, trade policy, financial regulation and debt management.
